name: The Rail Runner
description:
The Rail Runner is a new runner game guaranteeing you fast-paced, action-packed futuristic gameplay, giving you a gaming experience that you won't be able to put down!

Inspired by the worlds of SciFi and Cyberpunk, this is an arcade style action game set in a dystopian future ruled by the Central Intelligence with amazing pixel art to boot! Your mission seems simple: get programs through the toughest of challenges on your way! Test your limits whilst fighting drones, conquer obstacles and getting to your final destination on each level whilst improving your skills.

The Rail Runner is Gamepad supported giving you the freedom of fully mapped flexible gamepad input. Alternative control modes support keyboard and mouse.

We offer two play modes:
- The Mission Mode: 8 different missions at increasing intensity levels in which your character, Gavriel the runner, is responsible for the delivery of programs needed to battle the Central Intelligence
- The Infinite Run Mode: Helps you getting the right skills to defeat the Central Intelligence and their drones whilst setting challenging distance records

Your character is equipped with a hover board with 3 different types of moving behaviour:
- Jetpack mode
- Platformer mode
- Triggered Propulsion mode

These will help you pass the most difficult of obstacles during your missions set by the Resistance!
Play The Rail Runner and give us constructive feedback! Thank you for playing!

Try our mobile version on iOS!
